Residential land / plot for sale in pothencode trivandrum .

Facilities like water and electricity is available in the area.

DESCRIPTION:
Premium 51-Cent commercial & residential property for sale in ulloor the best property in trivandrum

Are you searching for the best property in trivandrum that perfectly blends commercial potential with residential charm? Presenting a rare and valuable 51-Cent plot located at the heart of ulloor, trivandrum, ideal for investors, builders, and business owners looking for a prime location in the city.

 Property highlights:
Location: Ulloor, trivandrum city

Total area: 51 cents (Approximately 2064 sq. Meters)

Property type: Mixed-Use commercial property & residential use

Ownership: Clear title, single owner

Road access: Wide tar road frontage, with direct access to nh bypass and key city points

Pricing: Attractive rate considering the appreciation value of ulloor properties

 Ideal for commercial property development
This commercial property in trivandrum is strategically positioned in ulloor a fast-Developing zone known for its business centers, healthcare hubs, and proximity to technopark. The location offers massive potential for various commercial ventures like:

Multi-Storied commercial complexes

Retail outlets or shopping complexes

Hospitals, clinics, diagnostic centers

Showrooms, automobile outlets

Office spaces or it hubs

Service apartments or hotels

The high-Visibility frontage on a main road, combined with dense footfall from surrounding institutions, makes it a standout commercial property investment.

 Perfect for premium residential projects
If you are looking at premium housing or a combination of residence plus business, this is the best property in trivandrum for you:

Gated villas or luxury apartments

High-End residential flats with commercial units below

Serviced residences for technopark employees

Senior citizen homes or boutique residences

The neighborhood is peaceful yet well-Connected an ideal balance for residential development.

 Location advantages:
Proximity to technopark less than 15 minutes drive

Near medical college & hospitals kims, credence, ananthapuri hospitals within 2-5 km

Vazhuthacaud, pattom & kowdiar access major city centers within easy reach

Trivandrum international airport just 10 km away

Surrounded by schools, banks, supermarkets, and residential colonies

 Infrastructure & connectivity:
Wide tarred access road for smooth vehicular movement

Ample frontage for commercial display and branding

Strong civic infrastructure with power, water, and drainage ready

High appreciation zone with active commercial developments nearby

 Why this property?
Dual purpose advantage: Best suited for mixed commercial and residential projects

Prime location in ulloor the real estate hotspot of trivandrum

Suitable for investors, real estate developers, or business houses seeking expansion in trivandrum

Opportunity to build commercial spaces with residential units for maximum roi

Located in a high-Demand area with proven land value appreciation

 Investment scope:
Ulloor stands as a key location in the citys real estate landscape, making this commercial property in trivandrum a safe and lucrative investment. Whether you want to build a business complex, a healthcare facility, a retail venture, or a residential-Commercial mix project, this 51 cent plot in ulloor will serve all purposes.

In the fast-Paced property market of trivandrum, finding a sizable plot in a prime location like this is a rare opportunity. With both commercial and residential development scope, this plot ensures youre investing in the best property in trivandrum with assured growth and high returns.

 Contact us today!
For site visits, detailed pricing, or documentation, connect with us directly.
